body.name: Real Simple Magazine Kindle Edition
body.description: Real Simple is dedicated to making your life easier-every single day. Real Simple creates a positive, supportive, and relaxing experience through which modern women can learn, connect and share inspiring ideas and smart solutions that make their busy lives more enjoyable. Real Simple is the only lifestyle magazine you need, a one-stop-shop for healthy and delicious weeknight meals, home organization and decor, beauty and style, etiquette, health and wellness, personal finance, work-life balance, and so much more. Every page is practical yet sophisticated-just like you. A Real Simple subscription will give you the tools to live a more beautiful, mindful, and meaningful life. Real Simple, published by Dotdash Meredith, currently publishes 12 times annually. Frequency, format, and delivery of issues are subject to change without notice. Double issues, when published, will count as 2 issues. We reserve the right to substitute gifts of equal or greater value.

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #5,137,878 in Kindle Store (See Top 100 in Kindle Store) #3 in Interior Design eMagazines #3 in How-to & Home Improvements eMagazines #10 in Cooking, Food & Wine eMagazines

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 13, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Real Simple is anything but simple!
reviews.reviewText: It is heartwarming when writers share their thoughts and experiences. There are times when I feel like they’re sharing it with me personally. That alone pays for the price of purchase. Of course I do appreciate all the practical ideas of organizing and taking care of myself. But the most exciting thing I look forward to is reading about experiences that I’ll never have and places I’ll never go. I am taken exactly where I want to go!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this magazine
reviews.reviewText: I simply love this magazine and the subscription price is reasonable & really look forward to reading it every month on my Kindle. Great articles & home & fashion ideas

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nicely done but a bit too expensive
reviews.reviewText: Real simple magazine is nicely written and beautifully photographed. Can I find the cost is much too high. If it was more affordable I would purchase it more often or have a subscription. I wish paint materials across the board or more affordable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2020
reviews.reviewText: Not sure what warmth has to do with a magazine as far as the star ratings.....but this is a phenomenal magazine and I'm excited to enjoy it in a way that doesnt create clutter. Lots of great recipe ideas and good reads....some relaxing some uplifting, and some that pull at your heartstrings. I also enjoy all the inspo I get from real simple.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2018
reviews.reviewText: I love being able to access each new issue on the Kindle App on my phone. I just make sure to download it whenever I'm near Wifi and then it's always with me and accessible regardless of where I am. Also, all the issues I previously received are there also. Makes for great easy reference when you remember something you liked and want to look it back up in one of those issues.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 25, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great content, horrible online format for me.
reviews.reviewText: Love the magazine, dislike the online format!!! I never use it because the format is not intuitive. :-/

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 7, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I enjoyed receiving this magazine every month. It had some good tips and great book recommendations.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2020
reviews.reviewText: I give myself permission to be pampered: How often do we say that in today's world? When perhaps we should allow ourselves permission to have some me time so that we can give to the other people in our lives that we care about Enjoy your time reading in your get-away.
